POL-STIMULUS: Economic Stimulus (incl. Government Grants, Incentives, Rebates, Subsidies)
CORE-LABOUREXTENSIVE: Labour Market, Extensive Margin (e.g. Employment, Unemployment, Participation, Hires and Quits, Layoffs)
CORE-LABOURINTENSIVE: Labour Market, Intensive Margin (e.g. Hours Worked, Underutilisation, Part vs Full Time)
CORE-LABOURCAPACITY: Labour Market Capacity (e.g. labour market slack or tightness, the NAIRU)
CORE-WAGES: Wages, Salaries, and Employee Compensation (including Enterprise Bargaining)
CORE-ACTIVITY: GDP and Economic Activity (e.g. Domestic Demand, National Accounts)
CORE-DISRUPTION: Economic Disruption (e.g. trade tensions, COVID-19 pandemic)
CORE-BUSACTIVITY: Business Activity (e.g. Profits and Solvency, Inventories)
RE-RESIDENTIAL: Residential Real Estate (e.g. Housing, Rents, Dwelling Construction and Investment)
CREDIT-INTERESTRATES: The official cash rate or other interest rates
CREDIT-BANKING: Banking Sector (including Resolution and Macroprudential Policies)
CREDIT-PRICING: Credit and Asset Pricing (e.g. Asset Prices, Yield Curves)
CREDIT-BONDS: Bond Markets and Securitisation (e.g. RMBS, ABS)
CREDIT-CORPDEBT: Corporate Debt (e.g. Corporate Bonds, Business Loans)
CREDIT-GOVTDEBT: Government Debt (e.g. Australian Government Securities, Treasury Bills)
CREDIT-INFRASTRUCTURE: Financial Market Infrastructure (e.g. central counterparties, stock exchanges)
RISK-FINRISK: Financial risks (e.g. credit risk, duration risk, risk-on or risk-off sentiment)
EXT-COMMODITIES: Oil and Bulk Commodity Markets (e.g. Oil, Gas, Iron Ore)
FUN-DEMOGRAPHICS: Demographics and Population (including International Students and Migration)
OTH-ORGANISATIONS: International Organisations (e.g. IMF, Chinese Communist Party, ASEAN)
